cause.description:
The Bayat Family Foundation is dedicated to providing essential services to the people of Afghanistan. The Foundation is committed to building partnerships that enhance the family's business resources in sponsorship and support of direct human aid, as Afghanistan rebuilds. Projects focusing on education, health, empowerment of women, human basic needs and preservation of the rich cultural heritage of Afghanistan are central to the Foundation's activities.
This Foundation has been very active in the rebuilding process of Afghanistan. In the past few years, the Bayat Foundation has helped build hospitals, mosques, schools, and has funded numerous projects to help improve the lives of orphans, empower women, and has provided the basic needs of more than thousands of people living in Afghanistan.
When donating through Facebook, all proceeds are automatically forwarded to the registered charity: the Afghanistan World Foundation, a certified JustGive 501(c)3 nonprofit charity, to ensure your donations securely reach those who need them.
OR click to donate through the Bayat Foundation: http://bayatfoundation.org/donate.php
1. To help rebuild Afghanistan and bring about positive social and economical change to a war-torn Afghanistan
cause.mission: Raise funds to help make a positive impact on the situation in Afghanistan with an emphasis on rebuilding this war torn country
